grails.plugin.springsecurity.oauthprovider.provider

Class GrailsOAuth2RequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.request.DefaultOAuth2RequestFactory
      • grails.plugin.springsecurity.oauthprovider.provider.GrailsOAuth2RequestFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.OAuth2RequestFactory

    public class GrailsOAuth2RequestFactory
extends org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.request.DefaultOAuth2RequestFactory
    Based heavily on DefaultOAuth2RequestFactory which initializes fields from the parameters map, validates grant types and scopes, and fills in scopes with the default values from the client if they are missing. The API has undergone some dramatic changes compared to GrailsAuthorizationRequestManager. This stays close to the original, keeping the option scopeRequired. Some code duplication was necessary due to private methods.
    Author:
    Dave Syer, Amanda Anganes, Roy Willemse
